title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Project Design Course Based on Fashion Business Learning Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can develop practical business model proposals based on fashion trend analysis and market research findings.
Learners can complete cross-functional collaborative projects through role division within a learning community.
Learners can use digital tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.) to organize team project progress into visual materials and produce presentation resources.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
